thm 2wlkdlem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c1), caddc, nat1))
  -| wceq(c0, cs3(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cs2(c5, c6))
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c1), caddc, nat1), cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c4)))
  fveq2i(chash, c0, cs3(c2, c3, c4))
  eqtri(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c4)), co(cfv(chash, c1), caddc, nat1), co(nat2, caddc, nat1))
  eqtri(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c4)), co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)
  s3len(c2, c3, c4)
  df-3()
  oveq1i(nat2, caddc, nat1, cfv(chash, c1))
  eqtr2i(nat2, cfv(chash, c1), cfv(chash, cs2(c5, c6)))
  fveq2i(chash, c1, cs2(c5, c6))
  s2len(c5, c6)
}

thm umgr2adedgwlk(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

  jca(w0, wss(cpr(c3, c4), cfv(c7, c8)), wss(cpr(c4, c5), cfv(c7, c9)))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c3, c4), cfv(c7, c8), cpr(c3, c4), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c3, c4))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c4, c5), cfv(c7, c9), cpr(c4, c5), w0)

  syl(w0, w3a(wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1), c4), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat2), c5)), w3a(wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1))))
  simprd(w0, w3a(wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1))), wa(wne(c3, c4), wne(c4, c5)))

  sylanbrc(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c3, c4), c6), wcel(cpr(c4, c5), c6)), wcel(c1, cumgr), wa(wcel(cpr(c3, c4), c6), wcel(cpr(c4, c5), c6)))
  3anass(wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c3, c4), c6), wcel(cpr(c4, c5), c6))
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c1, c3, c4, c6, c5)
  3anim123i(wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1)), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1), c4), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat2), c5))

  s3fv1(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1), c3, c5)
  s3fv2(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1), c3, c4)
  3anbi123i(wceq(c3, cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(c4, cfv(c2, nat1)), wceq(c5, cfv(c2, nat2)), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1), c4), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat2), c5))
  bitri(wceq(c3, cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0), c3), wceq(c3, cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0)))
  eqeq2i(c3, cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0))
  fveq1i(c2, nat0, cs3(c3, c4, c5))
  eqcom(c3, cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat0))
  bitri(wceq(c4, cfv(c2, nat1)), wceq(cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1), c4), wceq(c4, cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1)))
  eqeq2i(c4, cfv(c2, nat1), cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat1))

  eqeq2i(c5, cfv(c2, nat2), cfv(cs3(c3, c4, c5), nat2))

thm umgr2adedgwlk(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2 ‚àß(# ` c0)= 2 ‚àß(c3 =(c2 ` 0)‚àß c4 =(c2 ` 1)‚àß c5 =(c2 ` 2))))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Edg ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 = <" c8 . c9 ">
  ‚ä£ c2 = <" c3 . c4 . c5 ">
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà UMGraph)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí({ c3, c4 } ‚àà c6 ‚àß { c4, c5 } ‚àà c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c7 ` c8)= { c3, c4 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c7 ` c9)= { c4, c5 })
} = {
  3jca(w0, c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2, (# ` c0)= 2, (c3 =(c2 ` 0)‚àß c4 =(c2 ` 1)‚àß c5 =(c2 ` 2)))
  2wlkd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c8, c9, (Vtx ` c1), c7, w0)
  simpld(w0, (c3 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c4 ‚â† c5), (c3 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c4 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c5 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)))
  jca(w0, { c3, c4 } ‚äÜ(c7 ` c8), { c4, c5 } ‚äÜ(c7 ` c9))
  syl5sseqr({ c3, c4 }, (c7 ` c8), { c3, c4 }, w0)
  ssid({ c3, c4 })
  syl5sseqr({ c4, c5 }, (c7 ` c9), { c4, c5 }, w0)
  ssid({ c4, c5 })
  eqid((Vtx ` c1))
  a1i(w0, (# ` c0)= 2)
  eqtri((# ` c0), nat2, (# ` <" c8 . c9 ">))
  fveq2i(chash, c0, <" c8 . c9 ">)
  s2len(c8, c9)
  sylibr(w0, (c3 =(c2 ` 0)‚àß c4 =(c2 ` 1)‚àß c5 =(c2 ` 2)), ((<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0)= c3 ‚àß(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1)= c4 ‚àß(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2)= c5))
  syl(w0, ((<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0)= c3 ‚àß(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1)= c4 ‚àß(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2)= c5), (c3 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c4 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c5 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)))
  simprd(w0, (c3 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c4 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c5 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)), (c3 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c4 ‚â† c5))
  syl(w0, ((c3 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c4 ‚â† c5)‚àß(c3 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c4 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c5 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1))), (c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß { c3, c4 } ‚àà c6 ‚àß { c4, c5 } ‚àà c6))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß { c3, c4 } ‚àà c6 ‚àß { c4, c5 } ‚àà c6), c1 ‚àà UMGraph, ({ c3, c4 } ‚àà c6 ‚àß { c4, c5 } ‚àà c6))
  3anass(c1 ‚àà UMGraph, { c3, c4 } ‚àà c6, { c4, c5 } ‚àà c6)
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c1, c3, c4, c6, c5)
  3anim123i(c3 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1), c4 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1), c5 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0)= c3, (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1)= c4, (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2)= c5)
  s3fv0(c3, (Vtx ` c1), c4, c5)
  s3fv1(c4, (Vtx ` c1), c3, c5)
  s3fv2(c5, (Vtx ` c1), c3, c4)
  3anbi123i(c3 =(c2 ` 0), c4 =(c2 ` 1), c5 =(c2 ` 2), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0)= c3, (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1)= c4, (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2)= c5)
  bitri(c3 =(c2 ` 0), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0)= c3, c3 =(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0))
  eqeq2i(c3, (c2 ` 0), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0))
  fveq1i(c2, nat0, <" c3 . c4 . c5 ">)
  eqcom(c3, (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 0))
  bitri(c4 =(c2 ` 1), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1)= c4, c4 =(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1))
  eqeq2i(c4, (c2 ` 1), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1))
  fveq1i(c2, nat1, <" c3 . c4 . c5 ">)
  eqcom(c4, (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 1))
  bitri(c5 =(c2 ` 2), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2)= c5, c5 =(<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2))
  eqeq2i(c5, (c2 ` 2), (<" c3 . c4 . c5 "> ` 2))

thm umgr2adedgwlkon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cwlkson, c2), c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ciedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cs2(c7, c8))
  -| wceq(c4, cs3(c1, c9, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cumgr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c6, c7), cpr(c1, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c6, c8), cpr(c9, c3)))
} = {
  2wlkond(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c9, c7, c8, cfv(cvtx, c2), c6, w0)
  simprd(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c2))), wa(wne(c1, c9), wne(c9, c3)))
  simpld(w0, wa(wne(c1, c9), wne(c9, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c2))))
  syl(w0, wa(wa(wne(c1, c9), wne(c9, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c9, cfv(cvtx, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c2)))), w3a(wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)))
  sylanbrc(w0, w3a(wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)), wcel(c2, cumgr), wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5)))
  3anass(wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c9), c5), wcel(cpr(c9, c3), c5))
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c2, c1, c9, c5, c3)
  jca(w0, wss(cpr(c1, c9), cfv(c6, c7)), wss(cpr(c9, c3), cfv(c6, c8)))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c1, c9), cfv(c6, c7), cpr(c1, c9), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c1, c9))
  syl5sseqr(cpr(c9, c3), cfv(c6, c8), cpr(c9, c3), w0)
  ssid(cpr(c9, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c2))

thm umgr2adedgspth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(SPaths ` c1)]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Edg ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 = <" c5 . c6 ">
  ‚ä£ c2 = <" c7 . c8 . c9 ">
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà UMGraph)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí({ c7, c8 } ‚àà c3 ‚àß { c8, c9 } ‚àà c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚â† c9)
} = {
  2spthd(c0, c1, c2, c7, c8, c9, c5, c6, (Vtx ` c1), c4, w0)
  simprd(w0, (c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c8 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c9 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)), (c7 ‚â† c8 ‚àß c8 ‚â† c9))
  simpld(w0, (c7 ‚â† c8 ‚àß c8 ‚â† c9), (c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c8 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c9 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)))
  syl(w0, ((c7 ‚â† c8 ‚àß c8 ‚â† c9)‚àß(c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c8 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c9 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1))), (c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß { c7, c8 } ‚àà c3 ‚àß { c8, c9 } ‚àà c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß { c7, c8 } ‚àà c3 ‚àß { c8, c9 } ‚àà c3), c1 ‚àà UMGraph, ({ c7, c8 } ‚àà c3 ‚àß { c8, c9 } ‚àà c3))
  3anass(c1 ‚àà UMGraph, { c7, c8 } ‚àà c3, { c8, c9 } ‚àà c3)
  umgr2adedgwlklem(c1, c7, c8, c3, c9)
  jca(w0, { c7, c8 } ‚äÜ(c4 ` c5), { c8, c9 } ‚äÜ(c4 ` c6))
  syl5sseqr({ c7, c8 }, (c4 ` c5), { c7, c8 }, w0)
  ssid({ c7, c8 })
  syl5sseqr({ c8, c9 }, (c4 ` c6), { c8, c9 }, w0)
  ssid({ c8, c9 })
  pm2.61d1(w0, c5 ‚â† c6, c5 = c6)
  syld(w0, c5 = c6, c5 ‚â† c6, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 })
  sylc(w0, (c5 = c6 ‚Üí { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }), (c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 }, (c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 })
  com13((c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 }, (c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 }, c5 = c6, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 })
  syl6bi(c5 = c6, (c4 ` c6)= { c8, c9 }, ((c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 } ‚Üí { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }), (c4 ` c5)= { c8, c9 })
  eqeq1d((c4 ` c6), { c8, c9 }, (c4 ` c5), c5 = c6)
  eqcoms(c5, c6, (c4 ` c6)=(c4 ` c5))
  fveq2(c6, c5, c4)
  ex((c4 ` c5)= { c8, c9 }, (c4 ` c5)= { c7, c8 }, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 })
  eqtr2((c4 ` c5), { c8, c9 }, { c7, c8 })
  syl5bi(w0, { c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }, c5 ‚â† c6, { c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 })
  bitri({ c8, c9 } = { c7, c8 }, { c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 }, { c7, c8 } = { c8, c9 })
  eqcom({ c8, c9 }, { c7, c8 })
  eqeq2i({ c7, c8 }, { c8, c9 }, { c9, c8 })
  prcom(c8, c9)
  syl6ci(w0, { c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 }, c5 ‚â† c6, c7 = c9, c7 ‚â† c9)
  syl(w0, ({ c7, c8 } = { c9, c8 } ‚Üí c7 = c9), (c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)‚àß c9 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1)))

  anim12d(c1 ‚àà UMGraph, { c7, c8 } ‚àà c3, { c8, c9 } ‚àà c3, c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1), c9 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1))
  ex(c1 ‚àà UMGraph, { c7, c8 } ‚àà c3, c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1))
  simpld((c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß { c7, c8 } ‚àà c3), c7 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1), c8 ‚àà(Vtx ` c1))
  umgrpredgv(c1, c7, c8, c3, (Vtx ` c1))

blocks.name: umgr2wlk
blocks.content: In a multigraph, there is a walk of length 2 for each pair of adjacent edges. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: umgr2wlkon
blocks.content: For each pair of adjacent edges in a multigraph, there is a walk of length 2 between the not common vertices of the edges. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: elwwlks2s3
blocks.content: A walk of length 2 as word is a length 3 string. (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elwwlks2s3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(nat2, cwwlksn, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(c0, cs3(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, co(nat2, cwwlksn, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(c0, cs3(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), w3a(wcel(nat2, cn0), wcel(c0, cword(cfv(cvtx, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(nat2, caddc, nat1))))
  wwlknbp1(c0, nat2, c1)
  3adant1(wcel(nat2, cn0), wcel(c0, cword(cfv(cvtx, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(nat2, caddc, nat1)), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(c0, cs3(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  sylbb1(wa(wcel(c0, cword(cfv(cvtx, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(nat2, caddc, nat1))), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(c0, cs3(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat3)))
  anbi12i(wcel(c0, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat3), wcel(c0, cword(cfv(cvtx, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(nat2, caddc, nat1)))
  eleq2i(c0, cword(c2), cword(cfv(cvtx, c1)))
  wrdeqi(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  eqeq2i(cfv(chash, c0), nat3, co(nat2, caddc, nat1))
  df-3()
  wrdl3s3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c2)
}

  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wceq(c0, cs3(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cv(s0))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c0, cs3(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cv(s0)))

thm s3wwlks2on(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(c1[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(s0[(Walks ` c0)]<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àß(# ` s0)= 2))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(c1[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(s0[(Walks ` c0)]<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àß(# ` s0)= 2)))), c2 =(Vtx ` c0))
  3bitrd((c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), <" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(c1[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c3), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0[(Walks ` c0)]<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àß(# ` s0)= 2)), (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0)‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1 ‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3), <" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(c1[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c3)‚Üî(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0)‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1 ‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3)))
  wwlknon(<" c1 . c4 . c3 ">, c1, nat2, c0, c3)
  syl6rbbr((c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0)‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1 ‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3), <" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0), (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0)‚àß((<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1 ‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3)))
  biantrud((c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), <" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0), ((<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1 ‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà UPGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, ((<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1 ‚àß(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3))
  anim12i(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1, (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3)
  s3fv0(c1, c2, c4, c3)
  s3fv2(c3, c2, c1, c4)
  3anass(<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0), (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 0)= c1, (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ` 2)= c3)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà UPGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(s0[(Walks ` c0)]<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àß(# ` s0)= 2))))
  bicomd(c0 ‚àà UPGraph, <" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àà(2[WWalksN]c0), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0[(Walks ` c0)]<" c1 . c4 . c3 "> ‚àß(# ` s0)= 2)))
  wlklnwwlknupgr(s0, c0, <" c1 . c4 . c3 ">, nat2)
  diff.cs3.s(s0, c1, c4, c3)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: umgrwwlks2on
blocks.content: A walk of length 2 between two vertices as word in a multigraph. This theorem would also hold for pseudographs, but to prove this the cases ` A = B ` and/or ` B = C ` must be considered separately. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-May-2021.)

blocks.name: wwlks2onsym
blocks.content: There is a walk of length 2 from one vertex to another vertex iff there is a walk of length 2 from the other vertex to the first vertex. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wwlks2onsym(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wcel(cs3(c1, c3, c4), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c4)), wcel(cs3(c4, c3, c1), co(c4, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cs3(c1, c3, c4), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c4)), wcel(cs3(c4, c3, c1), co(c4, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c4), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  umgrwwlks2on(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cedg, c0))
  syl6rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wcel(cpr(c1, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c4), cfv(cedg, c0))), wcel(cs3(c4, c3, c1), co(c4, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cumgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wcel(cs3(c4, c3, c1), co(c4, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c1), cfv(cedg, c0)))), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3anrev(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  umgrwwlks2on(c0, c4, c2, c3, c1, cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
  anbi12ci(wcel(cpr(c4, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c1), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c1, c3), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cpr(c3, c4), cfv(cedg, c0)))
  eleq1i(cpr(c4, c3), cfv(cedg, c0), cpr(c3, c4))
  prcom(c4, c3)
  eleq1i(cpr(c3, c1), cfv(cedg, c0), cpr(c1, c3))
  prcom(c3, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(<" c1 . c3 . c4 "> ‚àà(c1[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c4)‚Üî <" c4 . c3 . c1 "> ‚àà(c4[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), <" c1 . c3 . c4 "> ‚àà(c1[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c4), <" c4 . c3 . c1 "> ‚àà(c4[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c1), ({ c1, c3 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)‚àß { c3, c4 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)))
  umgrwwlks2on(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Edg ` c0))
  syl6rbb((c0 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ({ c1, c3 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)‚àß { c3, c4 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)), <" c4 . c3 . c1 "> ‚àà(c4[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c1), ({ c4, c3 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)‚àß { c3, c1 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)))
  sylan2b(c0 ‚àà UMGraph, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), (<" c4 . c3 . c1 "> ‚àà(c4[(2[WWalksNOn]c0)]c1)‚Üî({ c4, c3 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0)‚àß { c3, c1 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0))), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  3anrev(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  umgrwwlks2on(c0, c4, c2, c3, c1, (Edg ` c0))
  eqid((Edg ` c0))
  anbi12ci({ c4, c3 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0), { c3, c1 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0), { c1, c3 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0), { c3, c4 } ‚àà(Edg ` c0))
  eleq1i({ c4, c3 }, (Edg ` c0), { c3, c4 })
  prcom(c4, c3)
  eleq1i({ c3, c1 }, (Edg ` c0), { c1, c3 })

thm elwwlks2on(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c3)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2))))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c3)))))
  elwwlks2ons3(s0, c4, c1, c0, c3, c2)
  rexbidv(s0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c3))), wa(wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2)))))
  pm5.32da(w3a(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2))))
  sylan9bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwlksnon, c0), c3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2))), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2))))
  s3wwlks2on(s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(s0))
  exbidv(s1, wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2)))
  anbi1d(wceq(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4))
  eqcoms(c4, cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3), wb(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0), c4)))
  breq2(cs3(c1, cv(s0), c3), c4, cv(s1), cfv(cwlks, c0))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

  diff.cupgr.s(s0)

blocks.name: 2wspdisj
blocks.content: All simple paths of length 2 from a fixed vertex to another vertex are disjunct. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2wspdisj(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wdisj(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mptru(wdisj(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0))))
  disjord(s0, hs1, hs0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1)), wtru)
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2))
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  simprd(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c1, c1))
  wspthneq1eq2(cv(hs0), c1, nat2, c2, cv(s0), c1, cv(hs1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cwwspthsnon.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, co(nat2, cwwspthsnon, c2), cv(hs1)))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
}
